messages.speech: Mandarin Oriental is an international hotel investment and management group with deluxe and first class hotels, resorts and residences in sought-after destinations. The group operates 31 hotels and eight residences in 21 countries and territories, and has a strong pipeline of properties under development.
As an innovative industry leader, the group is committed to exceeding its guests’ expectations through exceptional levels of hospitality.
